name: Create Word and PDF documents with Plumsail from Jotform data
description: Automate the generation of documents in your company: create DOCX and PDF files from a template using Plumsail Documents. The scenario is started when a form is submitted in Jotform. Files will be saved in OneDrive. This works equally well with SharePoint, Dropbox, Google Drive, and other storage platforms. You can use it to create applications, orders, invoices, etc.
